rules_text: [i]Topple [/i]- {2}{G}, Remove a counter from a creature you control: Look at the top card of your library. If it’s a creature card you may reveal it and put it into your hand. If you don’t put the card into your hand, you may put it in your graveyard.
notes:
Old flavor text:
“Burrburr construct ‘Dungeon’! It ultimate passion of all adventurer-kind!”
